All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values|Serialized Form

S

saveUserData() - Method in class controller.Controller
Sends a signal to the Model that is time to save the user's data to the user data file.
saveUserData() - Method in class model.Model
Saves the user's favorites list (Model.favorites) and virtual pantry (Model.pantryList) to the user data file ("user_data.dat").
scene - Static variable in class view.GUI
Scene to be displayed by the GUI.stage.
searchBar - Variable in class view.GUI
Area where user can type a keyword to search the database for recipes.
searchBarButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Magnifying glass button to the right of the search bar in the search menu.
searchBarHandler(KeyEvent) - Method in class view.GUI
Makes a search when the user types ENTER into the GUI.searchBar.
searchButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Button on sidebar that switches the scene to the Search menu.
searchButtonHandler() - Method in class view.GUI
Switches to the Search menu.
searchDatabase(String) - Method in class model.Model
Uses the Model.db class to search the database for recipes with names that match the given query.
searchForRecipes() - Method in class view.GUI
Searches for recipes in the database based on what has been typed into the GUI.searchBar TextField.
searchInfo - Variable in class view.GUI
BorderPane that contains two Labels: GUI.recipesFound and GUI.filtersApplied.
searchRecipes(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Forwards the given search query to the Model for a list of recipes with names that match the given keyword from the database.
searchResults - Variable in class view.GUI
Table of search results either from the Pantry or Search features.
searchToolbar - Variable in class view.GUI
Brown bar that contains the search bar, search button, and filter button above the recipe table.
searchWithPantry() - Method in class controller.Controller
Forwards a pantry search request to the Model.
searchWithPantry() - Method in class model.Model
Uses the Model.db class to perform a "pantry search".
secondBounce(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Second bounce that plays after the animation in GUI.slideBounce(Node) finishes.
selectRecipe() - Method in class view.GUI
Determines what Recipe to set the GUI.currentRecipe pointer to.
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class model.Model
Unique identifier for this class in the serialization process for writing user data.
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class utilities.Recipe
Unique identifier for this class in the serialization process for writing user data.
setLength(int) - Method in class utilities.Recipe
Changes the amount of time it takes to make this recipe.
setName(String) - Method in class utilities.Recipe
Changes the name of this recipe.
slideBounce(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Bounces a slide to the right.
At the end of the animation, a second bounce will play.
slideDown(Node, boolean) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node down from off-screen into view.
slideLeft(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node left from off-screen into view.
At the end of the sliding animation, the Node will bounce twice.
slideRight(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node off-screen to the right.
slideUp(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node up from off-screen into view.
If this function is called from the Search menu, then the given Node will "bounce" at the end of the slide and the GUI.searchToolbar and GUI.searchInfo will also be given animations to play.
If this function is called from the Favorites menu, then the GUI.menuTitle will slide down once this animation completes.
stage - Static variable in class view.GUI
Used to display GUI.scene.
start(Stage) - Method in class view.GUI
Starts the GUI for the Apicius application.
stepsCheckBox - Variable in class view.GUI
Checkbox in the GUI.hideFilterMenu() that enables the GUI.stepsSlider.
stepsCol - Variable in class view.GUI
Column in the GUI.searchResults table that stores the number of steps it takes to make each recipe.
stepsSlider - Variable in class view.GUI
Slider that allows the user to filter recipes based on a minimum and maximum number of steps.
